column4: Hey guys, I'm running Ubuntu on a netbook. I kind of want a less bloated distro, but my USB only boots from certain drives, and I don't own one. Does anyone know of a good tutorial for stripping down Ubuntu?
are you using Ubuntu Netbook Remix?  Runs great on my Mini-9
- yeah, I am. It runs fine, but it does a lot more than I need it to do.
you can just start removing packages you don't need need, like open office, etc.
